quotes.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Why do they call it 'debugging' when it feels more like 'defusing a bomb'?
quotes.author: Anonymous Dev

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: If you think education is expensive, try ignorance.
quotes.author: Derek Bok

quotes.quote: A user interface is like a joke. If you have to explain it, it's not that good.
quotes.author: Martin LeBlanc

quotes.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
quotes.author: Yoda

quotes.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
quotes.author: Every Engineer Ever

quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Behind every great developer is a great stack of StackOverflow tabs.
quotes.author: Internet Wisdom

quotes.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
